So I had to write a poem for class and forgot about it until the day before and then when I got it back I found out I got an A for it. Here it is:

The Gate



The gate for many things,
Family and fun all take part.
Some events that occur may be flings,
Some people look at it as art.
To some it is scary and mystifying,
To others it is called home at night.
To strangers it can be tantalizing,
To frineds it could be the reason for a fight.
It suffers much pain to be so beautiful,
The cotton is its monthly companion.
I see it as a glistening jewel,
But a lot of the time I get none.
God gave women this precious gift,
Something so strong, it could make the world shift.



the only question she asked was if I'd seen the vagina monolouges. thank you vaginas, for being my poetic inspiration.

last night i spent three hours in urgent care for them to tell me that i have pneumonia. I feel like shit and want to go to work but everyone is telling me to just lay around and drink water. i have a test on wednesday and a paper due, and they want me to just lay around. urgh.

spencers is selling barcelets for the keep a breast foundation. it's a dollar donation and you get a little rubber bracelet that says "I <3 boobies" we might be out of black ones but we still have lots of white and pink ones. 

come get one to support breast cancer or to just have a bracelet that says boobies on it. dosn't matter it's still all for a good cause. 

oh and if you're a girl they should give you a little door hanger showing how to do a self breast exam.

George Carlin died today.

it's fucking sad.

seven dirty words will live on forever.

i got a message from elizabeth rue last night saying that it would be cheaper for her to just keep paying the rent than it would to move all her stuff out so i have less than a month to find another place to live or i'm fucked.

rent was so cheap there and i was ready to move in. i'm really fucking pissed. so if anyone knows any place available let me know, part of me wants to live alone though. so keep an eye out for me.

if you loved there will be blood then watch this trailer special due to today's date.


<lj-embed id="5" />

so i've been a very bad mood lately. really bad. 

but today I watched a movie that helped a lot. it's called wedding daze and it was stupid and funny but it helped a lot. I'm not sure why but it made me feel better about my self. I'm still not happy with myself and a lot of people and my self esteem is at an all time low, but for the next few hours i'll be happy. after that i'm sure i'll sink back down though.

I'm just really tired of a lot of the things going on in my life and wish that people would open up there fucking eyes to what their doing, it's childish.

so i went to louisville this weekend to audition for big brother, i stood in line for five and a half hours waiting to go in and do the thing, I was extremely nervous. Chris Bianchi was behind me too and we talked a little but it was more wierd that we were two people away from each other in line haha. They were doing one on one interviews for a long time and it was taking a long time so finally they went to three at a time and then when my portion came in and there was still about 500 people to go after me they started doing five at a time.

if they asked a lot of questions and took your picture that meant that they liked you, but since they did group interviews they took the group picture if they liked at least one of you.

my group consisted of this older woman who wore too much make up and was overly christian, a really quite weird looking guy who just kept answering things with "well, i'm in sales" or other ways of saying that he's got no life but working in sales. and then two drunk guys who were loud and annoying the whole time and the one next to me kept interupting me and the others during her asking questions.

I was frazzled the whole time too trying to think what my answer would be to the questions before it got to me, wishing that i was doing a one on one, but then half way through she looked dead on me and smiled and asked "so you know about the thing were you have to be in great physical, mental, and psychological health right?" she kept her eyes on me and i said "yeah", she never once looked at anyone else, she just smiled back at me with a reassuruing nod, i think that was the "i want you" (not in the sexual way but in the you would be good way, but she was hot so either one works haha) and then she focused a few more questions on me and then she asked to take our pictures. 

now all i wait on is a call from CBS to see if i make it to the next round of interviews. i'm praying I get it. even to be called back for a second interview would be truly exciting for me for real.

Thunder on the other hand kind of sucked, i don't want to type it out but it consisted of me getting lost at thunder thinking i would have to sleep on the street, me walking 15 or more total miles that entire day, Sara making me go to some weird party where i drank wine out of a box, me not sleeping but maybe 3 hours at her house while she was spending the night with Gress who i guess made her come back to his house because he was afraid that i was going to fuck her, and it being cold the entire time.

today was good, i hung out with brandy most of the day and that was fun and then got olive garden with rick and chris and sam and josh for lunch. now i'm off to lay down for awhile.

much love from your future big brother star, Jonathon

Michael came home from school,

I went to the kitchen and poured fake blood all over my hand,

i screamed fuck,

i ran in his room trying not to laugh,

i asked if he had any bandaids,

he yelped and shouted,

"you need more than bandaids!",

he scrammbled around freaked out and grabbed an entire box of bandaids,

i couldn't hold the laughing in anymore,

i screamed april fools,

he pushed me and i almost fell face first into a knife,

april fools could have been deadly.

but it was fucking funny.

so in karate while doing stretches we did this weird lunge thing and i noticed that one of my balls was showing from the leg of my shorts, kind of embarassing but funny at the same time, i just shot up and fixed the situation and then went back to doing it.

so last night i wanted some milk so i drove to the walmart across town at 1 in the morning and as i was leaving this little old man came up to me and asked if i could give him a ride home. I stood there for a few minutes and sized him up. i figured i could take him if it came down to it. well he ended up making me take him down scottsville road past the high school, into a trailer park and down some more, i figured he was taking me somewhere to shoot me or something but then he just asked for 75 cents to make a phone call for someone to help fix his car in the morning. i pulled it out of my change thing and gave it to him and he kept thanking me.

He said he had been standing at walmart for two hours, people just walked by and ignored him, got rude with him, or laughed in his face, i mean what ever happened to human kindness? Yeah i figure some people are scared that he might of killed them but you know he was a tiny little man, what could he of done. I'm faster and stronger than him so i mean i think i was good.
who knew what the events of this night would bring. i need sleep. haha so much did happen and could of happend. i'm still drunk. good night
RIP Brandon Cummins. I don't know why you did it but I can only hope that your in a better place now.

i'm now the sales supervisor of Spencers gifts here in bowling green how fucking awesome is that!

they told me i have to quit cosmos though that kind of sucks but i guess it'll be okay. 

moving around sucks hard.

parents come tomorrow and that kind of actually excites me.

someone left me 2 red roses under my windsheild wipers tonight and it's kind of creepy but flattering at the same time. if i knew who did it it wouldn't be as creepy and be more flattering so if you guys know who did it you should let me know.

1. just recently i've become addicted to sudoku online

2. i pray every night before i go to bed

3. i actually have people that i call archnemisis, their names are chis gooch, lincoln nevells, and kevin merideth

4. because of number 3 i do believe that i'm on my way to becoming a superhero, not that the previously stated three are cool enough to be my real supervillans

5. my short lived cancer scare was a weird time in my life, i did a lot of thinking about who i really wanted in my life and part of me wanted cancer in the end, how weird is that.

6. my favorite thing to eat is a large stick of pepperoni, just a hunk of pepperoni and i'm in heaven

7. my favorite television show is "Reba" it is one of the greatest shows on television

8. i've recently thought about joining the air force, i'm not going to but it has crossed my mind

9. i want to get a side piece tattoo of a pinup girl but i dont' know who i want to model the girl after

10. i really want to be a reality television star, big brother that is

The Everything Test

There are many different types of tests on the internet today. Personality tests, purity tests, stereotype tests, political tests. But now, there is one test to rule them all.

Traditionally, online tests would ask certain questions about your musical tastes or clothing for a stereotype, your experiences for a purity test, or deep questions for a personality test.We're turning that upside down - all the questions affect all the results, and we've got some innovative results too! Enjoy :-)

Personality
You are more emotional than logical, more concerned about others than concerned about self, more atheist than religious, more loner than dependent, more lazy than workaholic, more rebel than traditional, more engineering mind than artistic mind, more idealist than cynical, more leader than follower, and more extroverted than introverted.

As for specific personality traits, you are romantic (100%), innovative (71%), slutty (62%), horny (61%).

Stereotypes
College Student91%
Old Geezer83%
Young Professional70%
  
Life Experience
Sex31%
Substances43%
Travel35%

Politics
Your political views would best be described as Socialist, whom you agree with around 78% of the time. 		  Socioeconomic
Your attitude toward life best associates you with Working Class. You make more than 36% of those who have taken this test, and 92% less than the U.S. average.

If your life was a movie, it would be rated PG-13.
By the way, your hottness rank is 69%, hotter than 81% of other test takers.

TAKE THE TEST

And now it's time for this, I sad that it wouldn't happen but i guess it's time. I need to do it and if i don't i will regret it, i mean i already do. this is a good decision.

last night i had the worst night of sleep ever, i kept dreaming that i was late for work and all this stuff and then i finally get up and i can't find anything and for some reason my nose was bleeding, what the hell. 

i start driving to work and hit every red light between here and work, when i get there i work with abby, she's okay but she dosn't fucking talk. like i work for two hours straight of just silence, i try making conversation and it only last for like two minutes. then as soon as my boss gets there abby decides it's time to talk, like i havn't been trying to all day, and supposedly her husband is off of house arrest finally thats something that she keeps going on about.

my nose has been bleeding on and off all day, kind of weird, not a lot just like dabs. 

then i realized that it was past time for me to get off and i tried to get back to campus but damn Dr. Yambor's attendance thing, she locked the door on me as i was turning the corner, i was in MMTH and just yelled "FUCK" and walked down here to waste some time.

I don't feel good right now, my head hurts really bad, i think that might have something to do with the nose bleeds, kind of feel weird too like in my hand and legs. Maybe i just need a nap.

today has just been dealing blow after blow, its kind of awful and they keep coming. It's awful, what the fuck did I do to deserve this, i may just leave for awhile i guess some time to just do something would help i don't know part of me just wants to leave for awhile. I really don't want to go home this weekend. i mean leaving for one night and then coming back the next day just seems pointless. i do need to see my uncle and mom though. i don't know. 

I kind of hate it that one of the bad news things was that i have a huge order due tomorrow so i have to get up extra early to make everything, i deserve a damn raise.

oh and i'm getting an on-campus job too so be ready for no more jonathon people.

so yeah my room mate either needs to decide to leave or i'm throwning him out of the damn room. i layed hints last night that i was going to sleep but him playing guitar hero was a little disturbing till 1 in the morning. finally he turns it off but then turns on sports center. i struggled to fall asleep and then finally got up again at like two to tell him to turn it off. there are times where i just want to yell and scream "turn the fucking ESPN off you have to fucking life you fucking loser, watching the same damn sports highlights over and over again are just making me and you about brain dead you bastard!" i know that that is a little harsh but waking up at 6:30 was a bitch. 

classes are okay, i got some weird classes but they are okay. folklore is weird i have 4 books for the class it's awful. i also have Yambor every tuesday and thursday this is going to be fun. 

i think i may take a long nap for a little while.

yeah so last night was a good party night coming back to school i guess, could of been better but it was okay. the events after the parties were a little more interesting. it was just kind of chill. 

at one point it was just morgan, chris, elysia, and myself sitting in marys living room playing burnout. then me and morgan hear what we thought were sex noises coming from downstairs, then we mute everything while me morgan and elysia leaned over the coach to listen to a fight. this guy and girl were yelling at one another apparently they had both been hitting each other, the guy chocked her she burnt him in the face with a cigarette, and broke his arm, and we kept hearing these intense hitting noises but not sure who was hitting you. elysia called the police and then when the got there i told them were the apartment was. we then heard the guy tell the police to mind his own fucking business. i guess it all got settled cause we didn't hear anything the rest of the night.

it's good to be back. i'm thinking about what i'm wanting to do about my birthday.

yeah so being back in bowling green is good but i wish i didn't leave everything in LC in a big pile of shit like I did. I mean i wish I had confronted the problems head on rather than just letting everyone assume that I had killed my self or something. but oh well can't change that now. 

last night sleeping sucked ass by the way thanks Michael lol. no big deal bro. any way getting ready to head off to cosmos to see how much i'm going to be working this semester than doing some small errands around town. if your in Bowling Green you should give me a call i'm not doing anything too important.

sitting here in Centre college about to start the drinking and head to some parties here at frat row i started drinking earlier today with my mom isn't that weird haha. oh well tyler and jared arn't joining me because they fucking suck and i refuse to talk to them until they appologize for doing some stuff i've been getting my revenge in another way mwa ha ha. anyway things are okay my car gets fixed monday and and i leave for BG sometime next week so if your in town we should hang out. i'll talk to you guys soon hopefully.

yeah so i didn't make it to Louisville or any other big happening but i went on a beer run and gathered a few close friends at my house. My dad told me that him and mom were spending the night somewhere else so of course we acted the fool as much as we could. I'm pretty sure with some facebook stalking you can find two or three pictures of me that i don't wish to be viewed. I've got permenate marker all over my body and well so does everyone else that was there. I got in a fight with Jared over the phone for two reasons but the biggest one is that he yelled at me because i told him we wern't driving to his house at two in the morning. fuck him!

Still yet to be kissed at midnight on New Years but oh well i hopefully have a few more left to get it. 

so as for the subject of this entry. caitlin and brit tied rick to my little sisters bed and beth was doing something somewhere and tyler was wandering around the house aimlessly and me and carla were upstairs on the couch when my parents walked in at about three in the morning. of course i jump up pretend to be sober and straighten my apperence a little. rick is still tied to the bed with caitlin and brit and my dad decides that he wants to go check on everyone so that called for some explination plus all the empty bottles of vodka and other stuff. everyone was pretty drunk but carla so she used her charm on my dad to get us out of a lot of trouble. we then went down stairs and played a game of disney trivia after i took rick to the spare bedroom to pass out. then we all went to bed. a good night to say the least. I did get kicked in the nuts first thing in the morning but she felt bad about it and really thats all i could of hoped for. 

hope everyone had a good new year and that your breaks going well. you guys should call me sometime.

now i'm off to go pick up the tv set that we exploded at the beach the other night, this has been a messed up break.

so I, Jonathon Adams, have finally made the police blotter by myself i mean i was the only one doing the illegal act there were other people there but i made it by myself, over the summer we made the police blotter at least once a month but i finally did it by myself. i got really excited.

recent events of goodness have brought me to a new high, i know that when i go back to WKU it's going to be sad. i'm going to miss this, a lot. oh well I saw it coming. so i guess it's cool haha. fuck I love this break!

so this christmas break is becoming the best one ever, nothing holding me back, doing whatever i want, even though my parents have yelled at me numerous times because "my house isn't some damn hotel for half of lincoln county to stay at!" well i can't help it that people don't come over till 10 and leave the earliest at 3 in the morning. oh well, things seem to get better, i got good grades in all my classes and i couldn't be happier well unless i had gotten straight A's or something. I'm starting to appreciate my other friends here at home other than Tyler and Jared, who have become complete bastards as of late. 

tonight is family stuff and then making a trip to Lancaster to blow some stuff up, cause we all know how much i love that. hopefully no one will get hurt but knowing me you can probably expect my next entry to read "i just got released from the hospital with 2nd degree burns" hopefully not though. 

I hope that everyone is having a good break and that everyone is safe. If I don't talk to anyone before than have a merry Christmas, happy holidays, happy new year, happy kwanza or whatever you celebrate. 

oh and happy birthday to tyler roberts. he's now 21 and able to buy his own alcohol now.

As i stand up, shocked, unknowing what to do with blood rolling down my arms, pouring out of my mouth, dripping on the floor. I look at myself in the reflection of a mirror across the room. I look and all the pain goes away from me. I think to myself, "This is the start to a crazy break." After taking care of my bloody mess that I made in Tylers house i continue to watch one of the greatest movies on earth, full metal jacket, i'm in love with that movie. this was only the day after going out to eat with tyler jessica (her husband came too gag) and rebecca, rebecca drove me due to my car being awful now and we talked about a lot of things, she is dating one of my friends in south carolina he's stationed there for the navy, i think, on accident, i convinced her that she should break up with him if he dosn't get his act together, he's starting to be an ass to her from her side of the story. 

two nights ago i was sitting at my house working on a puzzle saying to myself "tonight is going to suck" then caminisch calls me and says that she wants to do something with the gang, so i call around and tyler, jared, caitlin, caminisch, and carla come over. i guessed that they were all going to leave after the movie went off but then we played poker and then we just sat around and talked for ever then we packed six people into jared car, i had to lay across people in the back seat which was a bad idea, and we drove to danville at 4 in the morning to eat at arbys. then we came back to my house i figured that they would leave then, but no we pulled out the twister board. i kicked ass on the second round and won. 

we then saw this commercial for a thing were if your depressed you go to the bahamas. it may have been the cheesiest commercial we have ever seen, so what do we do? we call the number and tyler pretends to be palistinian or whatever and this guy and tyler get into this fight and the guy on the phone said this before hanging up "do you want to go to the bahamas or the fucking al queda you dirty mother fucker?" thing was that this guy was really arabic or whatever.

just about everyone left halfway through the grudge when my dad needed out of the driveway. they thought i was crazy for not going to sleep until about 10 but whatever.

this break i think is going to kill me but there are some things that i am looking forward to. hopefully my prayers will be answered and somethings will turn around for me but the job hunting isn't going very well, i think i may just have to move back to BG early and just work at Cosmos while i rot away in BG by myself.

now off to check my grades, i know i got through my gerentology and poli. sci. class good but those arnt the ones i'm worried about.

stayed up real late last night only to get two hours of sleep in before work, then finding out that today was my last day there, i'm leaving during the day so that i don't get in trouble for only having one headlight now. I think that there have been more injuries than i thought over the wreck, my ribs kind of hurt and i'm in a lot of pain still with my back and neck. maybe the doctor would of been a good idea.

to clear up the Me too statement made in the last entry that has to do with my mom and dad and sister. My mom and dad are yelling at me because of how poor they are and my little sister is turning into my older sister, this is the part about the making the right decisions, as much as i say i don't like jessica i am her older brother and will take care of her. she's getting into drugs and she's fighting more and more with my parents, she's planning on moving out and living with her boyfriend. bad idea. I don't know what to do about it and it's starting to worry me.

i think i did pretty good on my poli. sci. final today, only music and bowling left, music tonight and bowling first thing in the morning. I may leave tomorrow instead of saturday i'm not sure.

My friend Jared bought a gun, I don't know how i feel about this.

arch nemisis' are everywhere now, i saw one last night, there is a good chance i'll see one as soon as i get home and another sometime over the christmas break. i hate having more than one like most people but then again i guess it just makes me more like a super hero.

real quick i am in desperate need for actors tomorrow night, i need three girls or three guys to dress as girls from 9-10 tomorrow night, please guys help me, this is a big part of my grade and the person i was getting to find me actors was no help. call my cell phone PLEASE! i would owe you so much.

Today i got up at 6:30 and got ready for work. 
I get to work and everything is normal.
We work as normal getting everything done and joking around.
I start making jokes a little after 8.
We start talking about when I tasted the stuff no one knew what it was in the freezer.
I then say that I could eat anything because i'm just awesome like that.
they tell me I can't.
(no one should tell me I can't)
they pull out the ground cinnamon.
they get a spoon full out of it.
I take the spoon FULL in my hand.
I put the entire spoon full in my mouth.

now little did i know that a spoon full of ground cinnamon makes a human stop breathing and induces vomitting at the same time within seconds of consumption. what cinnimon didn't go down into my lungs and throat came shooting out of my mouth like a dust cloud in probably the worst coughing session i have ever had. I then realized i couldn't breath and tried to drink water but there was no room in mouth really to fit any water. i then started freaking out and opened my mouth as wide as i could and put my head under the faucet. then i grabbed a cup of water and chugged it as fast as i could. i still couldn't breath the only thing i could think to do was chug more water while my co-workers just stood there with their mouth open scared that i was going to die, except for the girl who gave me the spoon who was laughing at my failed attempt to live at this moment. Then it hit me that the cinnamon was ready to come back out and I had a repeat from the other night but this time it was in a toilet so no clothing got thrown away this time. I then drank some milk after i was told that that would help and it did but i really don't think i will be able to eat cinnamon for like a year now. 

to sum this morning up: A: I'm a fucking dumbass B: i got most of the cinnamon down. FACE!

so i would like to point out before i type this that i was having a great day. In tv production i mastered the editting software i editted a whole commercial pretty much in like ten minutes, well my parts anyway and then poli. sci. was good, and i'm still in a good mood about last night.

okay on to the point, I was walking back to Rodes from poli. sci. class and i turned this corner and here comes this guy with a little cap on a red and white stripped polo shirt tucked into his kakhi shorts wearing flip flops, this guy also because of the cold weather was turning blue and he was fat so he looked like that little girl from charlie and the chocolate factory when she ate the thing to turn blue, and his mouth was in a way a baby goes after a bottle, all in all he just looked stupid.

so what is the first thing that comes to my mind. I just wanted to punch him in the face, i had the most uncontrollable urge to just deck this guy. I actually stopped for a second and weighed the pros and cons of knocking this guys nose into the back of his brain. I didn't do anything i just kept walking but it sort of bothered me that i considered beating this persons ass in the middle of campus just because he looks stupid.

Oh well i then started going up to other people to see if i was just in a fighting mood but no one else invoked such a frenzy of hate. hopefully i never see this guy again. oh son of tom o'leary i'm gong insane!

to those of you that are coming to the haunted house with me this weekend i need to know if you guys are staying at my house or not, also i need to know when you can leave i get out of class at like 11:30 but just let me know and if you want to come or know anyone that wants to come let me know. it's the houstonville haunted house in lincoln county, the scariest haunted house in Kentucky and it's going to be great, i'm also trying to find a party or i may just throw one so that everyone isn't bored shitless if we stay in lincoln county. if worse comes to worse we can party at center i'm always welcome at the beta theta pi house but we cruise the frats. 

also i've almost completed my costume for halloween, i'm dressing up as a superhero and I must say that i look damn good in the spandex that i bought last night. off to NADS today to buy a speedo. 

but just let me know whats going on about this weekend it should be a lot of fun.

so yeah i invited everyone on my friends list to join GENITALIA on facebook yesterday. the group reached 60 members in less than 12 hours from my friends list and my friend tyler G's friends list. well tyler is friends with a guy by the name of chris gooch. in high school chris didn't like me. i tried to be nice to him for a while but he hated everything about me and no one knew why. on his facebook he has a list of 5 people that he hates and the reasons why. they are all people from my high school and we don't know really why he hates us. 

to the point, he joins the group yelling about how we stole the GENITALIA joke from him, when in all reality me and tyler and chris and kyle all came up with it as well as TITS (teens into techniqil stuff) and PENIS (people expressing new Ideas selectivly) so he goes on a rant about how i'm a smarmy asshole, cataclismicly(or what ever) not funny. and then he tells everyone to burn in hell for all eternity and that he hates us all. so another guy that i don't know posted and started in on chris which made me happy. then i gave a little rant about the bastard and now there are a hand full of others that have lended a FUCK YOU to chris. If you would like to show your support to the FUCK YOU CHRIS cause on facebook go join GENITALIA right now.

Reply with your name and I'll tell you something I adore about you.

Afterwards, copy and paste this into your own journal

Reply with your name and I'll tell you something I adore about you.

Afterwards, copy and paste this into your own journal

so i broke up with alicia and i now feel like such a douch bag. i suck as a human and you know what i know that some people really don't like me so go fuck yourselves. i hate me and everything about me right now and i don't need anyone else not liking me so if you don't like me then don't pretend. fuck you and me how about that!

ok so i had a pretty interesting week off from school. after i watched my highschool do a performance of fiddler on the roof i organized a party at kyles house without him knowing (that's what he gets for telling me that his parents are out of town) we did a lot of fun things the one biggest thing is that for high school graduation tristan made a little scrap book and stuff and put it in a box that looked like a graduation cap and it was really cute well i decided it was time for it to go! i filled the box full of axe spray cans and then me and chris took more cans of it and sprayed the box down on the outside. then we shot bottle rockets at it didn't work so i had chris cause a destraction so that i could sneak some of kyles gasoline out of his garage and i poured it on the box and made a trail out of it and lit it. the axe cans exploded and sent stuff flying everywhere. 

after we cleaned up the mess me and chris made bubble wrap jump suits and started riding bikes then when they were patching up my jumpsuit with duct tape they tied me up with it and threw me in the truck of Rebecca's car. they drove me to food lion but i managed to get out and when kyle opened the trunk i attacked him. then we went back to kyles house and i didn't know it at the time but i put on a WW1 uniform i just thought it was a jacket and came down stairs and kyle told me someone died in it and i freaked out me and chris then changed into some funny clothes and went to walmart and goofed off. then we went back to kyles house and played "i've never" it got pretty boring so me and rebecca started talking about Lambert who's in the navy now and the stuff thats going on with that. then we went to kyles room and talked about it till 4 o'clock and when we came back down everyone was asleep. i left and went home. all in all i had a good week but part of me wishes that i went to florida with those guys like i was invited to do in the first place.

ok so last night me tyler and chris went and got christmas lights and extension cords, we dressed in black and went to kyles house. we wrapped his truck in christmas lights and ran back to the car and called his and screamed "marry christmas!!" him and his family thought it was funny as hell. we then started taking pictures wrapped up in lights and then when it was kyles turn we tied him up really tight with the lights so he couldn't get out and then left him for a few minutes that was the third time we pulled pranks on him that day. the first time we stole his tale gate and had a major chase scene through lincoln county! oh i miss those guys, my parents also told me that if i get arrested during spring break that i have to stay in jail until saturday night so i'm always making sure my shoes are tied before i do stupid shit so that i can run away.

also i just got back from my friend jessica's house and she told me that i was the "bad" friend, and everyone agreed. when they say bad friend they mean that i'm the one that dosn't care about getting in trouble and i say whats on my mind, i guess the bad influence. i don't think im that bad but i guess compaired to my friends i am.

Brittney house: oh really, wow, what has the biggest?
Tyler: Jonathon, duh!
Brittneay house: I don't know how you now that!

ok so i have to stay in Bowling Green until 6 am. sunday morning because of my radio shift right, well i worked someone elses too from 10 am to 1 pm so that i would have something to do. after that i took the fish (fiddy and jannice) out to eat, well really i went to McDonalds and they sat at the table eating their fish food while i ate. anyway i then just sat in my car with the windows rolled down and the fish sitting beside me reading more of my "nine stories" book. I then talked on the phone for a while with tyler and my mom and dad, then i decided that i should just leave the fish in the radio station under the supervision of my fellow djs. i havn't checked on them since so i better go do that after i get off of here. im sitting in mmth using the computer because i have nothing better to do. 

good news jenni nethers burned me a copy of the RENT soundtrack so i've been jamming out to that for the past two days now.

oh and some scary stuff. last night at the motel i layed down to take a nap at 6 o'clock and then tyler and chris called me to talk to me about something i forget and after i got off the phone with them, and i mean the second that i pushed the off button on the phon, the room phone rang, i picked it up and all i heard was someone breathing, i said hello for a long time and the breathing continued. this scared the shit out of me so i grabbed my keys and decided that it was time for a drive. i then came back to the room about one in the morning and checked everything making sure that no one was in there. i then locked the door and went to bed about the time i started dozing off i heard banging on the walls and someone screaming "I'm going to kill you!" i looked out the peep-hole and there was man at the door! but then a woman came up to him and then i relized that he was drunk and talking to her and then his friends took him back to the room i didn't fall asleep for a couple hours out of pure fear. but i could of taken him if he tried something lol, he was a like 40 year old man about 5'3" no meat on him except for his beer belly. 

oh well time to go charge my phone and hang out at the revolution studios until i go see "V for Vendetta" i heard it was excellent. peace out people and be safe during spring break!

okay so i have every reason in the world to be happy right, I've got awesome friends, my family seem to be treating me much better, I got a girl that knows how to treat me finally, and lots of other things, but everyday i seem to be getting more and more depressed. I find myself telling me to smile or say something funny, when in all reality i just want to go to my room and curl up in the corner by myself. i'm not happy, i have to work somethings out in my life. the thing is that i don't know what i need to work out. spring break will be good for me i think. i've got a few plans, going to the school to teach the broadcasting classes (because they hired a dumbass that dosn't know how to put a tape in a VCR), going to Lexington to visit some people, going to Georgetown to see some people, hanging out with my friends, visitng family, and the best part, being at home for a whole week with out worrying about anything. oh and i also get to babysit fiddy and Jannice (alicia's fish because she can't take them on the plane)

I also feel very guilty about something that i'm doing, i'm not saying what it is but it involves a hand full of people that i really care about and i just feel like shit, i should come clean but i can't and i don't know how. oh well i will figure it out eventually.

ok, so life has been going pretty great right now. everything just seems to be going right you know. but i've had a lot of things on my mind. like i'm not sure if I enjoy being here, and when i say here i don't mean WKU, i mean like on the planet you know. some times i just want to end it and the thing that scares me the most is that I don't feel like anythings holding me back. I sometimes want to live on the edge and just go. not worry about consequences and just do what ever but then i think of my friends, some times i act stupid and i feel like i'm pushing friends away by acting this way but the thing is that they have never seen me this way, this is the way I act, all they saw last semester was me being bossed around by Tristan, acting like I was some sort of scared child. but in all reality this is me, i act stupid, sometimes i do so much stuff that i tends not to make sense. 

also, some of my friends here i have gotten to know pretty well. Micheal Puckett is one of the coolest guys i've ever met, Jenni Allison is the sweetest girl in the world, Cyndi Johnson is like she would put it "the cat's pajama's", Tyler Roberts is hilarious, Alicia Barker is so freaking cute and awesome to hang out with. these are just some of the people i've gotten to know even better this semester and i'm happy to call them some of my best friends.

Even with all of this, I feel that my depression is coming back, I suffered for almost two years and it got pretty bad, the last thing that i want is to end up in the hospital again. I don't know if i can control it on my own this time, last time i went through it i just told myself to get over it and after about two years i did, i don't know if i can do it again, i hurt myself and everyone around me. If i hurt anyone in any way let me know.

I really don't know why but for some odd reason, i'm not mentioning any names, people that shouldn't be are reading my live journals. I don't know how to make this thing friends only but if your going to get mad about what i put in my LJ, then don't read it! I keep hearing shit about "why did you write that" or unwanted aim messages about what i write in my LJ. the people that i'm talking about know who they are! the only people that are my friends on here are Micheal, Cyndi, Laura, and Cat. those people have been posting comments and thats fine I love you guys and wish to keep hearing from you. but there are some people that get mad at these little details. well i'm sure that i'll be getting a few im's from these unwanted people about this entry as well. so i only have one thing to fucking say! 

This is a fucking journal, this is where i write the things down that are going on in my head. when i start typing i don't really notice what i'm typing until i look at it later. if you get upset at anything that i say shove it up your ass! this is my fucking LJ and i can write any god damn thing in it I want, got it!?!

It was easy being a vegitarian when i was eating a majority of all my meals with another vegitarian. I figure that if only eat chicken i can still eat pretty healthy. i'm still going to stay on a lot of vegitables and stuff but i will eat chicken maybe one or two times a week.
